headline: The Smartest Dividend Stocks to Buy With $1,000 Right Now
summary: Here are three stocks offering attractive yields of up to 4.9%, each backed by strong businesses.

headline: Is Clorox A Bargain After Its 36% Slide Despite Strong Cash Flow Outlook?
summary: Wondering if Clorox at around $104 a share is a beaten down bargain or a value trap? You are not alone, and that is exactly what we are going to unpack. Despite its defensive reputation, the stock is down about 0.8% over the last week, roughly flat over 30 days, and still sitting on a steep 35.7% loss year to date and 34.6% over the past year. Those declines have come as investors reassess classic household staples in a higher rate world and rotate toward flashier growth names, raising...
